Remember that it is the last decide rule that wins. So if a rule that com=
es after the TooManyHopsDecideRule accepts the URL, then that verdict super=
sedes the one made by the TooManyHopsDecideRule.

Typically, the last rule =
is to always allow prerequisites (DNS/robots.txt) and for those you could g=
et a larger hoppath.

- Kris
